name: AppSourceCop Ruleset
description: Ruleset mit m√∂glichst vielen aktiven Regeln

rules.justification: AppSourceCop Rule - The ID range assigned to the extension must be within the allowed range for App Source Apps
AppSourceCop Rule - The 'applicationInsightsKey' property must specify the AAD instrumentation key.
CodeCop Rule - The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
CodeCop Rule - You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects.
CodeCop Rule - The value of the Tooltip property of Fields must be filled.
